title: Skater Ad Font
content:
Hi guys,  
which is this font? i am trying a similar match but i am not sure...

Thanks for your help ;)

Cheers,  
S

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1524792\_10152031310814088\_1656885095\_n.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824100226/http:/typophile.com/files/1524792_10152031310814088_1656885095_n.jpg) | 23.55 KB |
author: uzapucax

comments.content: I think it's probably [Alternate Gothic Com No 1](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824100226/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/alternate-gothic-lt/). There are a host of other similar typefaces such as [League Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824100226/https:/www.theleagueofmoveabletype.com/league-gothic) and [Trade Gothic Bold Condensed No 20](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824100226/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/).

thanks tylor! very good info indeed ;)

League Gothic is the ONE!

Best,  
S
